definition: nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Could keep the file or document for a long time.
sentences.chinese: 可永久性保存檔案或文件。

sentences.english: Rayon of permanent and can be removed.
sentences.chinese: 粘膠劑的永久性和可移除性。

sentences.english: Forever fire resistance is made from aramid materials, with high cost on production.
sentences.chinese: 永久性防火線爲芳綸材料製成，成本較高。

sentences.english: Permanent cells have left the cell cycle and are destined to senesce and die.
sentences.chinese: 永久性細胞已脫離細胞週期，註定要衰老和死亡。

sentences.english: Objective To enhance therapeutic efficiency of the implanted permanency cardiac pacemaker.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲提高安裝永久性心臟起搏器的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Is permanent, but now no longer a tetracycline .
sentences.chinese: 四環素牙是永久性的，但是現在已不用四環素了。

sentences.english: Huangpu River permanent fountain depicts a group of moving stories of this period.
sentences.chinese: 黃浦江邊一組永久性噴泉再現了這段動人的佳話。

sentences.english: Links must be permanent and static HTML.
sentences.chinese: 鏈接必須是永久性的和靜態HTML。

sentences.english: It is destabilizing if you do not have permanent fixes.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有永久性的修復方案，就會造成不穩定。

sentences.english: Note that bleaching is a permanent color change that is not reversible.
sentences.chinese: 要注意的是，漂白劑具有永久性。

sentences.english: There was no hypoparathyroidism and recurrent nerve paralysis in this group.
sentences.chinese: 術後無永久性甲狀旁腺功能減退和喉返神經麻痹。

sentences.english: Think of it as a permanent, global book club.
sentences.chinese: 你可以將其設想爲一個永久性的全球讀書會。

sentences.english: Deep scarring and permanent craters may also form as a result of this method.
sentences.chinese: 深疤和永久性的小坑也是這種治療辦法的後遺症之一。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of hair autotransplantation.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察自體顯微毛髮移植治療永久性禿髮的效果。

sentences.english: A lay-off can be temporary or permanent.
sentences.chinese: 裁員有是暫時的，也有是永久性的。

sentences.english: Communities across the Gulf Coast were forever changed.
sentences.chinese: 整個波斯灣沿岸地區的社區永久性改變。

definition: to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
